top_comment.text:
How does Cenk Uygur feel about the end of Current TV and the TYT-produced 
show for the network? What about the end of Air America? What changed for 
The Young Turks on Current and the other shows on the cable network, and 
what did it mean? Cenk Uygur gives his unfiltered thoughts on the situation 
and what will happen next. CLICK HERE to watch: http://bit.ly/1dd6XV9﻿
top_comment.author: The Young Turks

comments.text:

comments.author: Christine Peace

comments.text: Libtards like TYT should be banned from all forms of media.
comments.author: Tracie Amber Wilkinson
